messages.message: The control plane pod failed with `FATAL controlplane/main.go:334 -- Failed to create context. Error: createAppContext failed: NewAppComponents failed: failed to initialize KubeManager: KubeManager.loadDynamicCronJobPatches failed: open /etc/config/dynamic-workload-config-templates/envoy-sidecar-patch.yml: no such file or directory`
cc @Ashwin havenâ€™t we seen this before?

@Jeff you should be able to get around this for now by setting `.Values.deployment_manager.enable_dynamic_workloads` to false in the tenant HVF (https://github.com/instabase/gitops-deployments-sandbox/blob/main/deployments/helm/v1/eng/core-services/db-collate4/instabase/tenant-values.yaml) for this env and then syncing from the argo UI
@Jeff is this sandbox based off an old version of master? Im curious how it ran into this bug
Possibly. I was trying to update the sandbox based off my feature branch.
I think this sandbox was spun up a while back.
